messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Hello & suggestions
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: neha  My husband is in the middle of looking for another job & plans to take a month off between jobs - maybe sometime before
messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: neha <nishaysmom@...>

My husband is in the middle of looking for another job & plans to take
a month
off between jobs - maybe sometime before the baby is born. We were
planning that
he & Nishay take a few days/week father-son trip sometime then -
possibly
camping or doing something else (?ideas) - and we thought it would be
extra nice
if they could hook up with other unschooling dads for the chosen
activity. Is
there anyway to find out if there is something going on then? Where
would I
look, who would I ask/write to? any other ideas?

-=-=-

This list is a good place to start. there are also two Dads' lists:
SSUDs@yahoogroups.com and UnschoolingDads@yahoogroups.com

The Live and Learn Unschooling Conference in Albuquerque, MN September
6-10 might be an idea---LOTS of unschooling dads and kids all weekend.
Exotic place, cool museums, and neat stuff to do.



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith


________________________________________________________________________
Check out AOL.com today. Breaking news, video search, pictures, email
and IM. All on demand. Always Free.

messages.subject: Hello & suggestions
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I am a lurker .... let me introduce myself briefly. My name is Nia & I have a 5 yr old son (6 in August), and another little boy on the way in
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

I am a lurker .... let me introduce myself briefly. My name is Nia & I have a 5 yr old son (6 in August), and another little boy on the way in Oct. We have always unschooled - Nishay (son) has never attended school or daycare (except 3 unfortunate weeks a long time ago).

My husband is in the middle of looking for another job & plans to take a month off between jobs - maybe sometime before the baby is born. We were planning that he & Nishay take a few days/week father-son trip sometime then - possibly camping or doing something else (?ideas) - and we thought it would be extra nice if they could hook up with other unschooling dads for the chosen activity. Is there anyway to find out if there is something going on then? Where would I look, who would I ask/write to? any other ideas?

Thanks in advance! and thanks for this wonderful list!
Nia




__________________________________________________
Do You Yahoo!?
Tired of spam? Yahoo! Mail has the best spam protection around
http://mail.yahoo.com
